metadata.title: CVE-2024-0810 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to121.0.6167.85 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to leak cross-origin data via a crafted ChromeExtension. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
